text: Fhe Bakɨme kha suambarar Abrahama ga muuŋgi. Ana khaŋ ana suaŋgi, “Ndu Aisakan panan ndun nzɨgi gu nzɨkmbigi hegɨrga.” Fhe Bakɨme mbara Abrahaman mparav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu mba kama bavira, ndu ana shogip, nan ofar muuŋri.” Ana maaŋ nzuaim, Abraham Fhe Bakɨme mba suaŋgi bigi ndir za farasarigi guma, ana Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgap, ana Aisakan Fhe Bakɨme nɨɨn za mbui.
